title: 3D holograms to bring 2020 Olympics closer to TV viewer
text:
3D holograms to bring 2020 Olympics closer to TV viewer 1:59pm GMT - 00:50 
Japanese telecommunications company NTT is hoping to bring an added dimension to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics by projecting live sporting events with its 3D hologram technology. Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Japanese telecommunications company NTT is hoping to bring an added dimension to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics by projecting live sporting events with its 3D hologram technology. Jim Drury reports.
